text: Qamamine is a village in Akkar Governorate, Lebanon. It is located at an altitude of 800 meters above sea level and includes a guesthouse the surrounding natural area. The area is mountainous and popular for trekking. The Qabeit al-Qamamin bridge is in the area and connects to the village of Qabeit.Brighter skies ahead as country recovers from major storm March 5, 2012 The Daily Star (Lebanon) ==References== Category:Populated places in Akkar District
title: Al-Qamamin
